name: Beat City
synopsis: Feel The Beat: Using the stylus, players tap, swipe or hold on queue to the music's beat in order to receive a high star rating within each mini-game. Pick-Up And Play: There are 20 colourful rhythm-based mini-games that players can choose from to play on a whim. Plus, players can go back at any time to try and beat their old score. Unlock The Beat: Players can play through the story mode, Beat Revolution to unlock mini-games and more than 20 items in the Beat Album. Rhythm Ratings: Beat City provides immediate and constant feedback on players' individual actions so there's never any doubt on the progression.
